summary: A letter from Warden Laraine N Diaye of the Metropolitan Correctional Center to Judge Richard M. Berman, confirming that the FBI and OIG investigations will include the July 23, 2019 incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at the MCC, and that an internal investigation on that incident has been completed. The letter is copied to several legal and court officials.

keyFacts: An incident involving Jeffrey Epstein occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center on or about July 23, 2019.
An internal investigation regarding the July 23, 2019 incident has been completed.
The FBI and OIG (Office of the Inspector General) are conducting investigations that will include the July 23 incident.
Warden Laraine N Diaye states she cannot divulge any information about the prior internal investigation at this time due to the ongoing FBI and OIG investigations.
The letter is part of the court record for case 1:19-cr-00490-RMB, United States v. Jeffrey Epstein.
